name: Guten Tag Officer
description: A very short and very simple python text "game" I made, if it can even be considered that.  This is a prototype of prototypes, I made this originally around 2 years ago or so and half of it is just print('').   Seriously this game is barely even playable and there are a lot of bugs and the application terminates without notice once the script finishes.  I just want to see if people like the idea or concept and I may get back to working on the project and make it into a much larger and more complex text game.
